title: Trade finance: Certificates of origin
dataVerified: Exporter name, importer name, goods description, origin country, chamber of commerce certification, certificate number
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Link to chamber of commerce system (customs authorities and importers, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake origin certificates used for tariff evasion and trade agreement abuse. Domain binding verifies chamber of commerce. Customs clearance verification for import duties. Preferential trade agreement compliance (NAFTA/USMCA, EU FTAs). Anti-dumping enforcement. Critical for international trade where origin determines tariff rates and eligibility for preferential treatment.
